channel.title: CVE Feed for HashiCorp -- Terraform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HashiCorp -- Terraform

item.title: CVE-2023-4782|2024-09-26T14:05:36.006Z -- hashicorp -- terraform
item.description: Terraform version 1.0.8 through 1.5.6 allows arbitrary file write during the `init` operation if run on maliciously crafted Terraform configuration. This vulnerability is fixed in Terraform 1.5.7.
